institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Internal human resource development support project operation rules/Article 10 (Application for support)
contents: Article 10 (Application for Support) ① Companies or business owners' organizations (hereinafter referred to as *companies, etc.) that satisfy Article 5 (2) and (3) of the Vocational Competency Development Regulations and wish to participate in the learning organization support project may apply for learning organization. The application for participation in the support project and the project implementation plan must be submitted to the agency with jurisdiction over the business location., ② The project implementation plan under Paragraph 1 must include the following: 1. Purpose and outline of the project, 2. Support details Separate implementation plan, 3. Other matters necessary for project implementation, ③ In addition to companies restricted from applying for support pursuant to Article 5 (3) of the Vocational Competency Development Regulations, the Chairman may restrict support applications to companies judged to be unsuitable for the support purpose of the project. ④ When receiving an application for participation under Paragraph 1, the head of the affiliated organization must check the support target and support requirements, exclude ineligible applicant companies from the application results, and companies that require supplementation of submitted documents must request supplementation and submit. ., ⑤ If the supported company no longer falls under the list of companies eligible for preferential support under Article 12 of the Enforcement Decree of the Employment Insurance Act during the business period under Article 13, Article 2 (3) of the Framework Act on Small and Medium Enterprises applies mutatis mutandis to the maximum support period range. can be considered a company eligible for priority support. However, if the industry is changed to one for which support is restricted pursuant to Article 5, Paragraph 3 of the Vocational Competency Development Regulations, support will be discontinued from the following year., ⑥ The industry standards under Article 5, Paragraph 3, Item 4 of the Vocational Competency Development Regulations are for Korea as announced by the Commissioner of the National Statistical Office. Follows the standard industrial classification.
